about_the_game:
Arthur was the eldest son of the famous DuPont family and lived a carefree life. If nothing unexpected happened, his future would be extremely bright and happy.
However, on a night of thunder and lightning, an accident happened as expected...
The originally lovable younger brother suddenly changed his temperament. He did something outrageous in his madness...
Arthur was framed innocently and had no way to defend himself, so he fled to the Western Regions to avoid disaster. His biological mother was also expelled and her whereabouts are unknown...

[Gameplay]
Make friends with teammates with different personalities, and in the process of team adventure, uncover the truth under the fog... meet challenges one after another.
There are also some interesting side quests in the map, hoping to add a little joy to your adventure journey.

Battle: Boss battles with different characteristics.
Skills: Including magic skills and anger skills. As the level increases, new skills are automatically learned.
Equipment: Powerful high-level equipment, waiting for you to collect.

[Main Characters]

The first warrior in the Western Region, the illegitimate son of the Dupont family. He is not good at talking but has a resolute character. He gradually grows into a powerful warrior through experience.


The guardian knight of the Habsburg family. A loyal knight with outstanding defensive ability, he is a trustworthy teammate in adventure.


A pure and kind little priest, whose background is unknown... No matter what situation he encounters, he will firmly follow the protagonist. He has excellent healing ability in battle and is an indispensable role in the adventure team.


Mysterious identity, love gossip and adventure. Judging from her words and deeds, she is probably a spoiled daughter of a noble family.
